data.name: Hauntify Mixed Reality
data.description:
The player must survive and expel evil spirits from their entire house. Turn your house into a horror game and experience evil spirits that will hunt you down. The Spirts will be able to navigate your physical environment. The game has been updated to include new content, complete redesign, improved gameplay, more game modes, spirts, and 80% increase in the time it takes the player to setup his/her environment. There are up to 10 evil spirts you can avoid, each with a unique ability and hunting style.

Hauntify Mixed Reality can be played in any type of building.  

Important: Make sure you restart your headset after downloading to fix any tracking issues.

Note: We recommend not to disable the Oculus boundaries. Play on a single floor.  Hauntify MR setup has almost no limit on the size and complexity of your physical environment, but we recommend that you play safe and keep your boundaries on.

If you need help with the setup or have feedback, join our Discord page on the company website!
